name: New Oria Office Desk Cognac
teaser: Say goodbye to corporate and hello to fun with the Oria Office Desk in Cognac. This one of a kind desk features a clear glass top for an overtly
complete_description: Say goodbye to corporate and hello to fun with the Oria Office Desk in Cognac. This one of a kind desk features a clear glass top for an overtly modern appearance. The satin nickel finished pillars support the structure in style while providing space for two soft closing drawers in cognac. With an adjustable height and striking finish, this desk is ideal for any home office looking to turn heads. Pair this one of a kind piece with the Pandino Office Chair in Cognac.
features: Clear Glass Top (Not Tempered) | Iron in Satin Nickel Finish Pillar | Cognac Regenerated Leather Cabinet | 2 Drawers | Weight Capacity: 100 lbs
